props.leftText: We are dedicated to providing innovative solutions that help our clients achieve their goals and drive success in their respective industries.
props.rightText: To be the leading provider of cutting-edge technology solutions, empowering businesses to thrive in the digital age.

sessions.title: Welcome presentation
sessions.description: Brief overview and a warm welcome to all participants. This session will cover the agenda, housekeeping rules, and introduce the keynote speakers.

sessions.title: Poster presentation
sessions.description: Brief overview of posters and topics. Participants will have the opportunity to view research posters and interact with presenters.

sessions.title: Keynote Address
sessions.description: Inspirational keynote presentation by industry leaders covering the latest trends and future directions in the field.

sessions.title: Coffee Break
sessions.description: Networking opportunity with refreshments and informal discussions.

sessions.title: Panel Discussion
sessions.description: Expert panel discussion on current challenges and opportunities in the industry. Q&A session included.

props.item1Caption: Found the event useful for their professional career development.
props.item2Caption: Reported that the congress met their educational goals and learning expectations.
props.item3Caption: Agreed that the information presented was well-balanced and supported by scientific evidence.

props.title: Frequently asked questions
props.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we'll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.answer: Of course. Our pricing scales with your company. Chat to our friendly team to find a solution that works for you.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: We understand that things change. You can cancel your plan at any time and we'll refund you the difference already paid.

faqs.question: Can other info be added to an invoice?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can add any additional information you need to your invoices, including custom fields and notes.

faqs.question: How does billing work?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible billing options. You can choose monthly or annual billing, and we accept all major credit cards and payment methods.

faqs.question: How do I change my account email?
faqs.answer: You can update your account email anytime from your account settings. We'll send a confirmation email to verify the change.

props.ctaText: Still have questions? Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
